Question.Subject: free music download site?
Question.Content: i dont know if i want limewire or not. but i just want to know my options my friend was talking about a site that you just drag or click on the song and you have it. (yeah i know its vague) but i dont remember what she was saying haha sorry but i dont really know about free downloading sites.. i have only used itunes so yeah any requests? and also one that doesnt really have viruses.
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Don't use that stuff! See the risks of file-sharing technology at http://www.us-cert.gov/cas/tips/ST05-007.html Instead, look at http://searchformusic.eu.pn/ It searches more than 80 free, safe, legal music sites (for whole albums, add the word "rapidshare"). This way you can forget about viruses.
Hope this helps. Regards!

Answer.Content: Limewire could get you a virus. You could use: www.jamglue.com

Any free downloading program, or website is illegal, and has many, many viruses. If downloading from the web, the browser generally installs spyware, and adware onto your PC without you knowing.
Limewire has viruses which are easier to detect, but if you download a song from it that is not a song, your computer is caput, or completely useless until it gets cleaned out, or you end up having to reinstall Windows.
The only safe way to get free music, is Limewire, on a Mac. If you have both, you can download to your hearts content, because there are no Mac viruses to download using Limewire, the song just wont work, and you delete it.
Answer.Reference: I run the Piracy page teaching people how to steal music, movies, and games.

Answer.Content:
The safest way is to go to individual websites. Anytime you deal with websites with a lot of traffic you open yourself up to viruses, spyware, adware, etc. Here is a hip-hop/rap artist BrookDon's website with free downloads to get you started.
http://www.brookdon718.com

Don't use that stuff! See the risks of file-sharing technology at http://www.us-cert.gov/cas/tips/ST05-007.html Instead, look at http://searchformusic.eu.pn/ It searches more than 80 free, safe, legal music sites (for whole albums, add the word "rapidshare"). This way you can forget about viruses.
Hope this helps. Regards!
http://www.mp3obsession.com/ is a good music download site. It's not free though, songs start at 10Â¢ each and the site is legal and safe to use.
